import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import data from '../data' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetaiils) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails return (
Back to results
  • {product.name}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock>0 ? (In Stock) :(Unavailable) }
) }
